name: germinate
content:
germinate verb
(SEED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ]
  biology
  specialized to (cause a seed to) start growing: The beans will only germinate if the temperature is warm enough.

[ I ] to start developing: I felt an idea germinating in my head/mind.
